Package parkeersimulator.model.statistics

Class Advice

  • java.lang.Object
    • parkeersimulator.framework.Model
      • parkeersimulator.model.statistics.Advice
  • public class Advice
extends Model
    Class that contains all the advices and the parameters to decide whether to display them or not.
    Version:
    30.01.2019.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getAdvices()
      Returns the ArrayList with all the advices.
      void reset​(StatisticsList statisticsList)
      Resets the advices and assigns a nre StatisticsList to track.
      void tick()
      Increments the tickCounter by 1, checks if the tickCounter has reached 30 and updates the advices if this is the case.
      private void updateAdvice()
      Checks for every advice whether it needs to be displayed or not, adds the advices that need to be displayed to the advices ArrayList.

    • Method Detail

      • tick

        public void tick()
        Increments the tickCounter by 1, checks if the tickCounter has reached 30 and updates the advices if this is the case.

      • reset

        public void reset​(StatisticsList statisticsList)
        Resets the advices and assigns a nre StatisticsList to track.
        Parameters:
        statisticsList - the new StatisticsList to track.

      • getAdvices

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getAdvices()
        Returns the ArrayList with all the advices.
        Returns:
        the ArrayList with all the advices.

      • updateAdvice

        private void updateAdvice()
        Checks for every advice whether it needs to be displayed or not, adds the advices that need to be displayed to the advices ArrayList.
